members.member:
Displays a standard dialog box that prompts the user to select a file location to open.
Initial directory displayed by the file dialog box
/// Determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.
Returns a string with full path to file.
== ONLY in Unity's Debug Mode == "Could not register the window class, win32 error 0" may occur.

Displays a standard dialog box that prompts the user to select a location for saving a file.
Initial directory displayed by the file dialog box
/// Determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.
Returns a string with full path to file.
== ONLY in Unity's Debug Mode == "Could not register the window class, win32 error 0" may occur.

member.name: M:MeteorMindsTools.MeteorToolsObject.LastKnownDirectory
member.summary: Get the directory to the previously selected directory before closing.
member.returns: Returns a string with the directory to the previously selected directory before closing.
